=head1 NAME

Lucy::Document::HitDoc - A document read from an index.

=head1 SYNOPSIS

    while ( my $hit_doc = $hits->next ) {
        print "$hit_doc->{title}\n";
        print $hit_doc->get_score . "\n";
        ...
    }

=head1 DESCRIPTION

HitDoc is the search-time relative of the index-time class Doc; it is
augmented by a numeric score attribute that Doc doesnâ€™t have.

=head1 METHODS

=head2 set_score

Get score attribute.
